example.eg: I have ten tasks that I need to complete today.
example.egtrans: 我有十件事情要在今天做完。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 工作, 要做的事情, 任务

example.eg: His task was to restock the shelves at the shop.
example.egtrans: 他的职责就是为商店上货。

example.eg: Completing the report was quite a task, but I did it!
example.egtrans: 完成那份报告真是件苦差事，不过我还是做到了！

trans_examp.trans_cn: 困难的任务, 苦差事

example.eg: The lawyer tasked his assistant with the paperwork.
example.egtrans: 那个律师给助手分配了文书工作。

example.eg: He was tasked with loading the data onto the computer system.
example.egtrans: 他被派给了将数据载入计算机系统的任务。

example.eg: Many doctors are disillusioned with their jobs because of the clerical tasks that need to be completed.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 文书工作, 行政事务

example.eg: Studies show that dual-task performance is not as efficient as when someone concentrates on a single task.

dsense.name: keep on task, stay on task

example.eg: Keep on task everyone; we're nearly finished now!
This job will require you to multitask; is that something you can handle?

trans_examp.trans_cn: 多任务, 同时做多件事

example.eg: With the deadline looming, the manager made sure everyone was on task.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 专注工作的，在工作状态中的

dsense.name: take [sb] to task, bring [sb] to task
take [sb] to task for [sth], bring [sb] to task for [sth]

example.eg: The coach took them to task for their poor performance.

dsense.name: take [sb] to task for doing [sth], bring [sb] to task for doing [sth]

example.eg: The Navy sent a task force to counter the attack.
The Mayor formed a task force to wipe prostitution off the streets of the city.
example.egtrans: 市长成立一个特别行动小组来清理城市大街小巷的卖淫活动。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 特别行动小组, 特别任务小组
特别行动小组, 特别任务小组

example.eg: You can use Task Manager to start and stop programs.
